DescriptionData.Title: Pilates stick, Exercise Resistance Band Yoga Portable Fitness Bar Home Gym with Foot Loop Ideal for Physical Therapy, Strength Training, Muscle Toning
DescriptionData.Description:
★ This controlled movement is not only great for building full-body athletic strength, it is also easy on joints and weak muscles that are recovering from overuse and injury.
★ Welcome to ATRNA shop, thank your presence and trust! You can click on our shop to see more products.
★ We will continue to update Resistance Band to provide customers with quality products.

★ Specification
- Item Type: Resistance Band
- Material: Natural latex tube / nylon / steel buckle
- Color: Black-Red

★ Package List:
- 1 * Resistance Band

★ Note
- This product is only for sale of Resistance Band, other accessories are not included in the scope of sale, please pay attention when purchasing.
- Because of the light effect and the different computer monitors, there may be the color difference.
- Size is manual measurement, there will be 1-2cm error.
- If you have any questions about these Pedal Resistance Band, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you email and solve your problem in 24h.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ CONVENIENT AND STURDY: The pole can be split and torn,the EVA feel comfortable,durable.
★ ADJUSTABLE LENGTH: Adjustable buckle,quick length adjustment, quick and convenient.
★ SAFE MATERIAL: Safe and anti-breaking design,sturdy imitation nylon structure.

★ ANYTIME ANYWHERE: Home, hotel rooms, offices, and even outdoors Anytime, anywhere you want to start a sporting event or sport you want, it's very easy to carry and a small portable gym. Perfect home-based strength training.
★ CUSTOMERS SERVICE: If you have any questions about these Resistance Band, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you email and solve your problem in 24h.
